question: ####[UFAQ 24](https://ancur.wikia.com/wiki/Reign_and_Reverie_UFAQ) [Michael Boggs] If The Outfit is playing against [Valencia Estevez](/en/card/07030), does the Corp start the game with 1 bad publicity and 8?
answer: No. The Corp does not "take" a bad publicity from Valencia, they simply start the game with the bad publicity.
